relations.title: Sustainability of Digital Formats: Planning for Library of Congress Collections

name: ODF Family.  OASIS name: Open Document Format for Office Applications (OpenDocument).  ISO name: ISO/IEC 26300, Information technology -- Open Document Format for Office Applications (OpenDocument)
extras: <?xml version="1.0" encoding="utf-8"?><metadata><field name="formatCategory">other</field><field name="filenameExtension"></field><field name="internetMediaType"></field><field name="pronomPUID"></field></metadata>
description: A family of formats designed for office productivity applications, including word-processing, spreadsheets, and presentations. Specification maintained by OASIS.  The regular ODF files are in packages based on the ZIP format and incorporating an XML-based manifest file to list component files.  A Flat XML representation is also defined.
